short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to reply to LinkedIn comments (only those at the first level) with a custom message from ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the post in a dedicated window, open the comment section, enter your OpenAI key, launch the extension and let the magic happen.
